subject: Tennis
Davis Cup
lead_paragraph: The brothers Andy and Jamie Murray led Britain to a hard-fought victory in Glasgow over Lleyton Hewitt and Sam Groth of Australia on Saturday for a 2-1 lead in their Davis Cup semifinal.
snippet: The brothers Andy and Jamie Murray led Britain to a hard-fought victory in Glasgow over Lleyton Hewitt and Sam Groth of Australia on Saturday for a 2-1 lead in their Davis Cup semifinal.
